title: Prague cancel the sister city pact with Beijing

replies.msg:
Prague has a sister city agreement with Beijing. The Mayor of Prague, Zdeněk Hřib has tried to negotiate the "one China Policy" written in the sister city agreement several times, but there is no response from China. The government of Prague has voted to cancel the sister city agreement.

Beijing has retaliated Prague's recent moves by declining several Czech orchestras to visit China.

According to Czech News Agency, the sister city agreement was signed in 2016 by the former pro-China mayor. The agreement has an article which stated that Prague supports the One China Policy. Zdeněk Hřib, the current mayor, tried to renegotiate the agreement and remove this clause, but receive no response from China.

Source:

曾來台訪問、對台相當友善的捷克首都布拉格市市長賀瑞普，原希望能就與大陸北京市所簽姊妹市協定裡的「一中條款」，與北京談判，但始終未獲回應。布拉格市府7日決定，解除與北京的姊妹市關係，該市議會近期也將通過這項決定。

為了報復布拉格近來種種不友好的舉動，北京迄今已取消捷克4個樂團在中國大陸的演出。

據捷克新聞社報導，布拉格與北京的姊妹市協定是前任市長科爾娜喬娃於2016年簽署，協定條文明定「布拉格市政府承諾，繼續履行捷克政府的一中政策，且承認台灣是中國不可分割的一部分」。現任市長賀瑞普就任後，市府多次向陸方交涉，希望刪除協定裡的「一中條款」，唯至今皆無任何回應。
